name: Rusted Defense
description:
This is for my first ever game jam and first time using GDevelop.

Instructions

  • Click on grey placement pads to build turrets
  • Turrets cost 20 resources to build
  • Killed enemies give you more resources
  • Turrets break down with use. Repair turrets by clicking on them
    • costs 10 resources to repair
  • Kill 20 enemies to win
  • Keep the enemies from wearing down the base at the bottom corner
    • You lose if the base health gets to zero

Tower defense game where you will need to defend the objective while keeping your defense placements from falling into decay. You are the commander of a unit in the Property Acquisition and Infrastructure Defense also known as the P.A.I.D. Group. Your job is to facilitate cooperate and government expansion through the solar system. Most importantly we work for the highest bidder, get P.A.I.D.
